titleStmt.title: Britannia, passionately and historically, remembring her misery and happinesse in former ages, and declaring her calamities, and expectations now.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed according to Order, by G.B. and R.W.,

notesStmt.note: Printers' initials from colophon; place of publication from Wing.
